SEARCH
Module main_module
Package main_module

Class BaseScreen

java.lang.Object
main_module.BaseScreen
Direct Known Subclasses:
ScreenA
public abstract class BaseScreen extends Object
Abstract class representing the base screen of the game. This class provides the foundation for managing game entities, updating game logic, and rendering the graphical representation of the game.

    • update

      public boolean update()
      Updates the game logic. Manages bomb explosions, collisions, player updates, and enemy updates.
      Returns:
      True if the game is over, false otherwise.

    • removeEntityFromField

      public boolean removeEntityFromField(int row, int col, int field)
      Removes an entity from a specific layer at the given row and column.
      Parameters:
      row - The row index.
      col - The column index.
      field - The layer index.
      Returns:
      True if the removal is successful, false otherwise.

    • addEntityInField

      public boolean addEntityInField(Entity entity, int row, int col, int field)
      Adds an entity to a specific layer at the given row and column.
      Parameters:
      entity - The entity to be added.
      row - The row index.
      col - The column index.
      field - The layer index.
      Returns:
      True if the addition is successful, false otherwise.

    • removeEnemiesWithZeroHp

      public int removeEnemiesWithZeroHp(List<Entity> enemies)
      Removes enemies with zero or below health from the provided list.
      Parameters:
      enemies - The list of enemies to be checked and removed from.
      Returns:
      The number of entities removed.
